meanings.definition: The process of transmitting photographs electronically.
meanings.sent1: Phototelegraphies allow us to send pictures through the internet.
meanings.sent2: I received a phototelegraphy of my family from overseas.
meanings.sent3: The phototelegraphies were so clear, it felt like my friends were right next to me.
meanings.sent4: Her smile in the phototelegraphy lit up the screen like a beacon.
meanings.sent5: The beauty of phototelegraphies is that they capture moments forever.

meanings.definition: A photograph that has been transmitted electronically.
meanings.sent1: I printed out the phototelegraphies of our vacation to hang on the wall.
meanings.sent2: The phototelegraphy of the sunset looked stunning on my phone.
meanings.sent3: He joked that the phototelegraphies made his cat look like a model.
meanings.sent4: The phototelegraphy of the city skyline was a digital masterpiece.
meanings.sent5: She cherished the phototelegraphies of her children growing up.

meanings.sent1: I will phototelegraphies the pictures to you as soon as I can.
meanings.sent2: She phototelegraphies the images to her clients for quick review.
meanings.sent3: The photographer decided to phototelegraphies the snapshots for a faster delivery.
meanings.sent4: He phototelegraphies the photos across the globe in seconds.
meanings.sent5: We can phototelegraphies the memories to share with loved ones.
